```{r, message=FALSE}
library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
db <- dbConnect_scidb(dbname = "imdb")
db%>% 
  dbGetQuery("SELECT ml.movie_id, ml.linked_movie_id, ml.link_type_id, t.title AS movie_title, t2.title AS linked_movie_title
FROM movie_link ml
JOIN title t ON ml.movie_id = t.id
JOIN title t2 ON ml.linked_movie_id = t2.id
WHERE ml.link_type_id =3;")
# remake of (3) means the movie is the remake of the related movie 
# remade as (4) meamns the movie is that take characters from related movies and made them into new tv shows or movies 
```
